master.odometry

Class OdometryCorrection

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • master.odometry.OdometryCorrection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class OdometryCorrection
extends java.lang.Thread
    OdometryCorrection handles correcting the position read by the Odometry using two Light sensors.
    Since:
    2016-11-08
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jerome Marfleet, Yu-Yueh Liu

        public void run()
        Method that extends from Thread. This is constantly running and correcting the odometer when the robot is travelling vertically or horizontally.
